title: Software Engineer
bio: A software engineer with over a decade of experience. Excited about solving big problems, learning new languages, and honing my craft.
Big tabletop board gamer and have developed a handful of games for BoardGameArena.
In my free time I'm gaming with friends, reading, or browsing Seattle's Scarecrow Video psychotronic section looking for old European horror movies I haven't seen yet.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
accomplishments: Designed and built a WYSIWYG tool for clinicians to build complex patient intake forms using logical branching
Designed and built a streamlined version of companyâ€™s app on the web that allowed patients to quickly fill out intake forms and schedule video visits with clinicians
Spearheaded integration of Auth0 MFA integration for patient facing website

experience.title: Software Development Engineer II
accomplishments: Helped develop Fire TV Alexa skill that helped customers use voice queries to search for content

projects.name: Don't Go in There on BoardGameArena
